name.ja: <ruby>疑念の社交場<rt>ハック・フォー・ザ・インテル</rt></ruby>

summoning_condition.en: This card's name becomes "Secret Order" while in the Graveyard.

requirement.en: When your opponent conducts a normal draw during the Draw Phase.

effect.en: Select 1 WIND Attribute monster with 1200 DEF in your Graveyard and add it to your hand or Special Summon it face-up to your field. Then, if you have "Handy Lady" face-up on your field, you can send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard.
